name: Entities
description:
Entities:

Welcome to the heart-pounding world of Entities, where horror meets tactical shooting in an experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Gather your courage and prepare to face the unknown, either alone or with a group of up to 4 players. Every match offers a uniquely intense adventure, featuring a dynamic puzzle system and relentless, randomized entities that are out to hunt you down and impede your progress towards your goal.

Key Features

Dynamic Puzzle System:

No two matches are alike. Engage in a riveting puzzle-solving experience that dynamically changes with each playthrough. You'll need your intellect as much as your shooting skills to conquer the horrors that lie ahead.

Extraction Shooter Mechanics:

Dying causes players to drop all items, creating a risk-reward system. Successful extraction allows players to keep items and receive a payment. Each player has a personal Stash for storing items, adding a strategic element to gameplay.

In-Game Economy and Store:

Players can earn in-game currency by completing missions. This currency can be used to purchase new weapons, tools, and items from a store, enhancing their arsenal for future missions.

The Entities:

Entities are demons or possessed life forms that hunt players down, adding an element of horror and urgency to the gameplay. Players must fight or avoid these entities to stay alive and complete their missions, intensifying the challenge.

Investigate and Explore:

Embrace the role of an operator working for a private search and rescue company. Navigate through lawless zones where danger lurks around every corner. Search for clues, items, and codes to unlock doors and unveil the truth.

Tools of Survival:

Rely on the tools at your disposal to enhance your investigative efforts. From unlocking paths to defending yourself against the horrors that await, these tools will be your lifeline in this nightmare.

Contract-based Missions:

Each mission, or "match," is a contract that you must fulfill. As the company's contracted operator, you're plunged into a series of high-stakes scenarios where your survival skills and cunning are put to the ultimate test.

Tense Shooter Elements:

Entities seamlessly weaves in heart-pounding shooter elements, giving you the means to fight back against the darkness. But remember, ammo is scarce, and not every encounter can be won with brute force alone.

Are you ready to confront the unimaginable? Step into the world of Entities, where survival hinges on your ability to think, act, and shoot your way out of a living nightmare. Face your fears, work together with your team, and uncover the chilling secrets that lie beneath the surface of this harrowing experience.
